meta.content: Jackson County is located in Gainesboro, TN.

div.span: Jackson County Schools will remain closed through the end of the school year as recommended by Governor Lee.

header.h2: Jackson County Schools will remain closed through the end of the school year as recommended by Governor Lee.

div.p: Jackson County Schools will remain closed through the end of the school year as recommended by Governor Lee. We plan to continue instruction to help students’ grades and the school meal program.

h2.a: Welcome to Jackson County School District

div.div: Welcome to the Jackson County School District! I am so pleased to welcome our new students as well as our returning students. We have made many recent improvements to our schools and we continue to expand our extra-curricular programs to ensure that all students may make the most of their time and explore a broad variety of interests. We believe that parent participation is key to student success; our new website is designed to provide parents with all the information they need to be active participants in their student’s education. You will find that the site works just as well on mobile devices as it does on a desktop so you can find information on the go. As always, I am happy to receive feedback and suggestions and my door is always open. Here’s to another great year!

h3.a: Jackson County Schools will remain closed through the end of the school year as recommended by Governor Lee.

div.div: Jackson County Schools will remain closed through the end of the school year as recommended by Governor Lee. We plan to continue instruction to help students’ grades and the school meal program.
The next School Board meeting will be April 30, 2020, 6:00 p.m. at the Central Office. Public access to the meeting will be limited in order to protect public health, safety, and welfare.
